title: Don't waste your time not many shops here anymore Jan 2016
review: Wasted my money to take auto rickshaw to Saket Mall there were only 5 shops in the whole mall. Its a dying mall. Not worth it. There weren't any restaurants or cafes.

title: Good place for shopping
review: This is a place where one  get a lot of veriety of cloths and food items. In summer spacially this place is full packed in the evening.

title: Best one
review: The saket Mall is very popular among the locals .. very rushy at sometimes.. best place to be visited by shopping lovers..

title: Liked the mall
review: This place is like any other mall in the city. It was crowded in the evening when we had gone. They were showrooms of many popular brands of clothes, jewelleries, shoes, electronics atc. We had a fun time window shopping here.

title: Nice restaurant. More gallery than shopping Mall.
review: It is a small venue, with about 10 businesses: 2 male clothing, has everything in domestic utilities, one small book store and a restaurant.

title: Best ever
review: Best ever shopping experience in this mall finest place in the agra city where you can find and explore many things
